text: Kirriemuir railway station served the burgh of Kirriemuir, Angus, Scotland from 1861 to 1965 on the Scottish Midland Junction Railway. == History == The station opened on 12 August 1861 by the Scottish North Eastern Railway. The station was closed to passengers on 4 August 1952 and to goods traffic in 1965. == References == Category:Disused railway stations in Angus Category:Former Caledonian Railway stations Category:Railway stations in Great Britain opened in 1861 Category:Railway stations in Great Britain closed in 1952 Category:1861 establishments in Scotland Category:1965 disestablishments in Scotland Category:Kirriemuir
title: Kirriemuir railway station
